chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
x: nat

Goal:
x < power n 2 -> length ⟬ x ⟭ <= n

Premises:
Notation power := (mscal mul 1)
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
power_smono_l : forall p q x : nat, 2 <= x -> p < q -> power p x < power q x
nat_lb_fix_1 : forall n : nat, n <> 0 -> ⟬ 2 * n ⟭ = ⟘ :: ⟬ n ⟭
nat_lb_fix_2 : forall n : nat, ⟬ 1 + 2 * n ⟭ = ⟙ :: ⟬ n ⟭
power_mono_l : forall p q x : nat, 1 <= x -> p <= q -> power p x <= power q x
power_mono : forall p q x : nat, 1 <= x -> p <= q -> power p x <= power q x
nat_lb_spec : forall n : nat, g_nlb n ⟬ n ⟭
power_sinc : forall k p : nat, 2 <= p -> power k p < power (S k) p
lb_nat_lb : forall n : nat, ⟦ ⟬ n ⟭ ⟧ = n
sum_2_power_2_injective : forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, j1 <= i1 -> j2 <= i2 -> power i1 2 + power j1 2 = power i2 2 + power j2 2 -> i1 = i2 /\ j1 = j2
nat_lb_fix_0 = g_nlb_fun (nat_lb_spec 0) in_gnlb_0 : ⟬ 0 ⟭ = nil
power_S : forall n x : nat, power (S n) x = x * power n x
power_decomp_lt : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat) (q : nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < q) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) < power q p
rel_iter.rel_iter_bound = fun (R : nat -> nat -> Prop) (k n x y : nat) => exists q c : nat, x * power n (S k) < q /\ rel_iter.is_seq R c q n /\ rel_iter.is_digit c q 0 x /\ rel_iter.is_digit c q n y : (nat -> nat -> Prop) -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments rel_iter.rel_iter_bound _%function_scope (_ _ _ _)%nat_scope
lb_meet_length_le : forall (n : nat) (l m : lb), length l <= n -> length m <= n -> length (l ↓ m) <= n
lb_join_length_le : forall (n : nat) (l m : lb), length l <= n -> length m <= n -> length (l ↑ m) <= n
remove_length_le : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), length (remove eq_dec x l) <= length l
power_decomp_unique' : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
power_decomp_unique : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
lb_pointwise_length : forall (f : bool -> bool -> bool) (n : nat) (l m : lb), length l <= n -> length m <= n -> length (lb_pointwise f l m) <= n
power_decomp_is_digit : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (a f : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> rel_iter.is_digit (∑ n (fun i0 : nat => a i0 * power (f i0) p)) p (f i) (a i)
div_by_p_lt : forall p n : nat, 2 <= p -> n <> 0 -> div n p < n
measure_rect : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> nat) (P : X -> Type), (forall x : X, (forall y : X, m y < m x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall x : X, P x
power_decomp_factor : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, 0 < i < S n -> f 0 < f i) -> ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a (S i) * power (f (S i) - f 0 - 1) p) * power (S (f 0)) p + a 0 * power (f 0) p
power2_gt_0 : forall n : nat, 0 < power n 2
power_ge_n : forall k p : nat, 2 <= p -> k <= power k p
nat_list_insert_length : forall (x : nat) (l : list nat), length (nat_list_insert x l) <= S (length l)
mult_2_eq_plus : forall x : nat, x + x = 2 * x
power_1 : forall x : nat, power 1 x = x
Nat.Proper_instance_0 = fun (x y : nat) (H : x = y) (x0 y0 : nat) (H0 : x0 = y0) => conj (fun H1 : x <= x0 => Nat.Private_Tac.not_gt_le (fun H2 : y0 < y => (fun H3 : x <= y0 => (fun H4 : y <= y0 => (fun H5 : y < y => Nat.Private_Tac.lt_irrefl H5) (Nat.Private_Tac.le_lt_trans H4 H2)) (Nat.Private_Tac.eq_le (Nat.Private_Tac.eq_sym H) H3)) (Nat.Private_Tac.le_eq H1 H0))) (fun H1 : y <= y0 => Nat.Private_Tac.not_gt_le (fun H2 : x0 < x => (fun H3 : y0 < x => (fun H4 : y0 < y => (fun H5 : y < y => Nat.Private_Tac.lt_irrefl H5) (Nat.Private_Tac.le_lt...
binomial_lt_power : forall n i : nat, binomial.binomial n i < power (S n) 2
